Reviews.Title: “Quaint hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: WFD0328
Reviews.Content: stay hotel du des champs elysees whenever visit paris love nice location fantastic front desk staff stayed 1996 hotel block champs elysees mid jardin des tuilleries arc de triumphe numerous cafes block hotel boulangeriepatisserie doors sends wonderful aroma fresh baked bread past window morning hotel offers breakfast expensive reasonably priced breakfast front door hotel cross street head left little cafe corner breakfast coffee perfect hotel family suite queensize bed sofa bed sleeps bathrooms terrace incredible view eiffel tower champs elysees block highend shopping avenue montaigne blocks champs elysees youll louis vuitton gucci prada etc youre looking french hotel experience convenient usual tourist sites transportation shopping absolutely wrong hotel

Reviews.Title: “The perfect taste of Paris!”
Reviews.Author: Softsoutherner
Reviews.Content: 2nd time stayed liked love near artsy lot hilton isnt enjoy paris meant youve heard bad parisiennes forget stay hotel helpful charming appreciate little french speak speak excellent english metro couple times mainly enjoyed walking evrywhere vary size time stayed 80 floor elevator stop stairs huge suitcases mind living city view tower outside door paris rooftops bed meticulously clean beautifully decorated breakfast perfect little near coffee pastry morning

Reviews.Title: “Genuine Parisian Hotel”
Reviews.Author: vanlipp
Reviews.Content: quaint little hotel immediately makes feel truely paris decor speaks olde world charm simply elegant ostentation comfortable bathroom fabulously spacious cleaning perfectly day fresh fluffy white towels awaiting return staff cordial friendly accommodating breakfasts lovely especially setting beautifully furnished dining splendid crockery served five day stay paris special hotel du home home location street below champs elysees perfectly situated peaceful welcoming return day

Reviews.Title: “A nice and warming hotel”
Reviews.Author: dumora75
Reviews.Content: reception except tall guy balcony didnt chance enjoy breakfast commend nice hotel location minutes walk metro champs elysees

HotelInfo.Name: Rond-Point Hotel Champs-Elysees
